meta.learningGoals: <par>In this skill you learn to <term>solve a linear equation with multiple variables</term>. If you have an equation like <inline-math/> then you will be able to determine the solution for <inline-math/> as <inline-math/>. This includes <skill-link>expanding any potential brackets</skill-link>, <skill-link>moving terms around</skill-link>, <skill-link>pulling the unknown out of brackets</skill-link> and eventually <skill-link>solving the resulting product equation</skill-link>. The latter also includes simplifying the result as well as checking it. This skill does not deal with <skill-link>equations with fractions containing <inline-math/> in the denominator</skill-link>.</par>
